parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Event Handlers
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove all event handlers from the given control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlRemoveAllEventHandlers''' handlerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> handlerName: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlButton [[ctrlRemoveAllEventHandlers]] "ButtonDown";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlAddEventHandler]]
</value></part></template>
